items.content_html: A lightweight CLI tool for converting and extracting information from magnet links. Easily parse magnet URIs, convert between different hash formats (Base16/32), and extract torrent metadata.
items.title: sh13y/Magnet-Link-To-Direct-Link-Web-App: A lightweight CLI tool for converting and extracting information from magnet links. Easily parse magnet URIs, convert between different hash formats (Base16/32), and extract torrent metadata.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
items.title: trifkee/NavKit: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.

items.content_html: Notes Saver App is a lightweight and user-friendly web application for creating, saving, and sharing text snippets. Built with React, Redux Toolkit, and React Router, it allows users to: ✅ Create & Edit Text Pastes ✅ Copy to Clipboard with One Click ✅ Search & Manage Saved Pastes ✅ Persistent Storage with LocalStorage
items.title: strangeMind-77/Notes-Saver-App: Notes Saver App is a lightweight and user-friendly web application for creating, saving, and sharing text snippets. items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension for mouse gestures, copy protection bypass, and quick search. Focused on essential features for optimal performance. (마우스 제스처, 복사 방지 해제, 빠른 검색 기능을 제공하는 가벼운 크롬 확장프로그램입니다. 핵심 기능에만 집중하여 최적의 성능을 제공합니다.)

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
